test_message: Validate expense: Category=Meals, Amount=$85.50, Date=2026-01-15, Employee=John Doe. Check against standard meal expense policies for spending limits, eligible expense types, and required documentation.

policy_violations.description: The submitted meal expense amount of $85.50 exceeds the standard per-meal spending limit of $50.00.
The expense was submitted for a date in the future (2026-01-15), which is not allowed unless advanced approval and justification are provided.
